body:
Comment 3: 
Thanks, but I already implemented the feature, it'll just have to go through the CL
process.

For what it is worth, my change consists of two lines (see patch). It reuses the same
ring that find-tag uses, so we do not need a new function, and it works when using both
godef-jump and find-tag in mixed-language code bases.
Attachments: 1. 0001-push-mark-to-find-tag-marker-ring.patch (846 bytes)
